quote: Piglet sidled up to Pooh from behind. Pooh! he whispered. Yes, Piglet? Nothing, said Piglet, taking Pooh's paw. I just wanted to be sure of you.
author: Author One

quote: Promise me you'll always remember: You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
author: Author Two

quote: Some people care too much. I think it's called love.
author: A. A. Milne
